response.overview: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.
response.tagline: Women want him for his wit. The C.I.A. wants him for his body. All Nick wants is his molecules back.
response.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man

titles.title: Semmit a szemnek! - Egy láthatatlan ember feljegyzései

release_dates.note: Cut for PG on film and video; uncut DVD onwards
